text:
very filling for a good price!

egg mayo onigiri: taste felt odd solely because i’m not used to the combination of egg mayo and rice. it was pretty filling (almost too filling) for an appetiser!

shitake cream and cheese: this can never go wrong, classic taste super good! it was topped with chili sauce but was only super mildly spicy (coming from a low spice tolerant person)

japanese curry katsu don: super good and filling! the katsu was crunchy and tasty while the curry was light and sweet (non spicy)

tofunagi don: so so much vegetarian meat in the bowl, definitely worth the price! it was crunchy and has abit of a bitter aftertaste

aonori fries: salted nicely with seaweed flakes ! super big portion (the picture doesn’t do it justice)

overall the food here was super good and really worth the price due to its taste and portion size! ordered so much for only around 30sgd!

creative menu and refreshing beverages. prices are fair and the team is attentive, a quality that’s hard to find these days. don’t be shy to ask for recommendations. I appreciate their non-dairy options 💯 they rly keep us coming back! we bring all our friends here and they LOVE Lucky Cat (both vegan and omnivores).

The service was AMAZING!!! When we arrived around 6.30pm there was already a long Q. The food came pretty fast. We really enjoyed the sashimi, tasted like the real thing, that we had a 2nd helping. The shitake cream & cheese sauce was very delicious but the dough a little thick. The tofunagi maki was the best dish. It was crispy & delicious. The noodles in the soup was a lil soggy, might be better with ramyeon instead. I enjoyed the curry katsu don, but my dining partner felt the jap curry sauce a lil sweet, but the katsu was really well done! The dining area was cosy & though it was crowded, it didn’t felt too noisy. It was a pleasant 十五 dinner!

Very tasty tobe honest. Enjoyed everything.  Although partly it is becos a lot of it is battered and deep fried. So vegetarian but a lot of deep fried stuff and sweet sauces.
Hence can be still not that healthy.

Anyway nice. Delicious enough for me.

Service is good. Beverages nice!

Friendly and attentive service crew, amazing coffee (hazelnut latte is my go-to), sushi is a must (avocado maki/tofunagi)/everything else on the menu is a W too if you leave anyt less than a 5 star review I’ll rly be questioning your taste buds 😵‍💫🔥 *check with staff if you need vegan options too 🫡🫶🏻
